name: Ford Racing 2
description:
Ford Racing 2 is a racing-arcade game developed by Razorworks. It came out on 01-10-2003. It was published by Empire Interactive. The game is rated as "Recommended" on RAWG.
Ford Racing 2 is available on PC and PlayStation 2.
Danny Rawles and Slade Anderson produced the game. Bjorn Lynne and Tim Follin scored the game.
